channel.title: Custom drag kite shield twohanded?
channel.description: I recently added the dragon kite shield custom model from the models section into my server and all is well with its animation and all but when I wield it the kite registers as a two handed shield because it wont let me wield a weapon with it. A fix anyone ??

item.description:

did u compile?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 02:21:59 pm[/size][hr]you also have to go into your class8.hava look for the custom you added and change the id to 15000

item.title: Custom drag kite shield twohanded?
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

I added the id to 15000 in all my client and server files and it still is two handed…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 01:58:31 pm[/size][hr]I just went back into my server and when I was wielding my dragon sq and then clicked on dragon kite it overwielded the dragon sq and two shields were being wielded at the same time…what in the world??

Read full topic

item.title: Custom drag kite shield twohanded?
item.dc:creator: @N0vlafe N0vlafe
item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

because the id of your dragon kite is a 2h wep try changing the id to a kite or make it 15000, go into ur item.java look for shield add 15000 in it than go into item.cfg and add 15000 and put it stat and stuff

Read full topic
